data.actual_result: It gets cut off as if you where on a server
data.expected_result: Your name should show fully as it did in (4040)
data.short_description: The Box below the channel list which contains your avatar/username/discrim no longer shows the users full name as of TestFlight 2.3.1 (4048)
data.steps_to_repro: - Look at the bottom of you screen by setting and see that your full discord name isn’t displayed  - Close discord  - Go to TestFlight and downgrade to 2.3.1 (4040) -  Launch discord and look down to where settings are - You should see your full discord name
